## martes 

```{r}
f <- function(x){
  if(x<=10){
    y <- -(0.5*x-5)^2
  } else if (x>20){
    y <- (0.5*x-10)^2
  }else{
    y <- 0
  }
  return(y)
}
fv <- Vectorize(f)
```


```{r}
train <- df %>% mutate(dummy = fv(Mday)) %>%  filter(Date<"2017-07-01")
test <- df %>% mutate(dummy = fv(Mday)) %>%   filter(Date>="2017-07-01")  
```
